title: Broken Chain

verbs: Can represent breaking free or overcoming restrictions.
nouns: Depicts a snapped chain, symbolizing liberation or release.

description: A chain shown mid-break, representing freedom, release, or the act of breaking away from restraint. The broken chain conveys the moment of liberation or escape.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the broken chain emoji is rendered with realistic metallic links that appear to be bursting apart, surrounded by sparks or debris. The visual energy captures the instant of impact‚Äîsymbolizing release, resilience, and triumph over confinement with a glossy, 3D metallic finish.
